binding:binding.name: MiOS Binding
binding:binding.description: MiOS is a home-automation platform natively supporting Z-Wave, ZigBee and Bluetooth devices, along with extensibile support for Security systems, AV control, Energy Monitoring and Heating/Cooling.
binding:binding.author: Mark Clark

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host or IP
parameter.description: The host name or IP address of the MiOS Unit

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: The port of the MiOS Unit (optional)

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Communications Timeout (ms)
parameter.description: Timeout (ms) used to compute MiOS Unit timeouts (optional)

parameter.name: minimumDelay
parameter.label: Wait time (ms)
parameter.description: Wait time (ms) for MiOS Unit to bundle changes (optional)

parameter.name: refreshCount
parameter.label: Changes only
parameter.description: Number of incremental cycles before a full refresh cycle occurs (optional)

parameter.name: errorCount
parameter.label: Error Count
parameter.description: Number of communication errors required to force a full reload (optional)
